name: Ether Serpent
text_description: The Ether Serpent rules the ether realm. While the Ether Serpent is in play, all Ether cards get +2 attack.
illustration_description: A massive, translucent serpent floats among the stars in an ethereal landscape. Its form radiates with a soft, pulsating light, and ethereal energy cascades off its scales, filling the space around it.
